name: Region Västra Götaland
goal:
Region Västra Götaland has the responsibility, according to Swedish law, for Regional development in Västra Götaland.
The main focus areas for the region is: that the region should have competative and sustainable Enterprises, should be leading in knowledge and competense development, have infrastructure and Communications with a high standard, be a leading cultural region and contribute to good Health for its Citizens.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Horizon Europe
CEF
Digital Agenda and issues regarding digitalisation.
Sustainability and climate initiatives
Migration
MFF
Cohesion policy
